body.p:
3
April 11th 4
Lt Col.
James T. Bramlette.
12th Ky Cavl.
Paris Ky.
Colonel.

I have the honor to inclose herein the Commission of Maj. Hamilton, and request that he defer his muster a few days until the Governor can hear from the War Dept. in reply to his application to have him mustered according to the date of his Coms. As soon as permission is received I will forward copy of same to you.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
